attributes.action: Let fathers who cannot see their children(through the mothers fault) not pay the C.S.A.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I have not seen my son for 7 years. His mother took him away, took him out of school, forced him to live as a vegan. I HAD NO SAY.She didnt turn up incourt when i wanted access but i am paying £300 EVERY month for a child i dont see. Its not right, its robbery.

reasons: Potentially libellous, false, or defamatory statements
